landing.title: WaterWay
landing.subtitle: Water Governance Platform
landing.description: Improve understanding, responsible use and governance of water in the face of climate change challenges
landing.problemText: Water is one of the resources most affected by phenomena such as prolonged droughts, climate variability and disorderly urban growth.
landing.solutionText: Web platform based on public and open data and artificial intelligence, aimed at improving water understanding and governance.
landing.odsText: WaterWay directly contributes to the Sustainable Development Goals, especially SDG 6: Clean Water and Sanitation.

hero.subtitle: WaterWay integrates artificial intelligence and public data to improve understanding, responsible use and decision-making about water in the context of climate change.

useCases.title: Use cases
useCases.subtitle: How different actors use WaterWay in their daily lives

student.name: María, high school student
student.scenario: Uses the educational module to learn about the water cycle and calculates her family's water footprint. The Telegram chatbot helps her with climate change homework.
student.impact: Increases her environmental awareness and shares what she learned with her family, reducing consumption by 15%.

citizen.name: Carlos, Bogotá resident
citizen.scenario: Reports an illegal discharge in the river near his neighborhood. AI automatically classifies the report and sends it to CAR. Receives real-time follow-up.
citizen.impact: The problem is addressed in 48 hours. The community reports 30 similar cases, identifying a pattern.

government.name: Laura, municipal analyst
government.scenario: Uses AI projections to plan Montevideo's water infrastructure. Models show high-risk areas for 2030.
government.impact: Prioritizes investments and presents a plan with solid data to the council, obtaining budget approval.

openData.title: Commitment to open data
openData.transparentText: WaterWay is built on the principles of the International Open Data Charter. All data processed, generated and visualized on this platform is publicly accessible.
openData.reusableText: WaterWay's architecture allows integrating new data sources and adapting to different regulatory and institutional contexts.
openData.privacyText: All personal data is treated in accordance with the data protection laws of Colombia and Uruguay. The platform implements anonymization and aggregation to protect privacy.
